ask_name: May I have your name, please?
plane_ask_flight_id: Can I have your flight ID, please?
plane_flight_available: The flight is available. Should I reserve it for you?
plane_flight_unavailable: Sorry, but the flight with id '{flight_id:d}' is not available any more.
plane_reservation_succeeded: Right, your flight is now reserved!
plane_reservation_failed: I'm sorry, but your reservation request was unsuccessful.
anything_else: Is there anything else that I can do for you?
out_of_scope: I am sorry, I don't quite understand what you mean. I am only able to help you reserve a flight.
